languages.text: "А затем приходит Сезон огня — пробуждаются вулканы, волны затапливают острова, и лишь твердь Асахейма дарует спасение тем, кто кровью и железом отстоит свое право жить на ней. Кланы бьются меж собой, а над полями битв кружат вороны и разносится волчий вой. Вот какой мой любимый дом, нет места во вселенной, подобного ему". {n}Голос Ульфара полон мечтательной ностальгии.{/n}

"And then comes the Season of Fire. Volcanoes awaken, waves wash over whole islands, and only the land of Asaheim offers salvation to those whose blood and grit win them the right to live upon it. Clan fights clan, crows circle over battlefields, and wolf howls rise up to the sky. That is my beloved home, there is no place in the universe like it," {n}Ulfar concludes wistfully.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А затем приходит Сезон огня — пробуждаются вулканы, волны затапливают острова, и лишь твердь Асахейма дарует спасение тем, кто кровью и железом отстоит свое право жить на ней. Кланы бьются меж собой, а над полями битв кружат вороны и разносится волчий вой. Вот какой мой любимый дом, нет места во вселенной, подобного ему". {n}Голос Ульфара полон мечтательной ностальгии.{/n}

"And then comes the Season of Fire. Volcanoes awaken, waves wash over whole islands, and only the land of Asaheim offers salvation to those whose blood and grit win them the right to live upon it. Clan fights clan, crows circle over the battlefields, and wolf howls rise up to the sky. That is my beloved home, there is no place in the universe like it," {n}Ulfar concludes wistfully.{/n}

languages.text: “在那之后，就是火季。火山苏醒过来，巨浪冲刷着整个岛屿。只有阿萨海姆这片土地，才能为那些靠鲜血与勇气赢得生存权利的战士们提供救赎。氏族之间战火不断，乌鸦在战场上盘旋，狼嚎声响彻云霄。那就是我心爱的故乡，整个宇宙没有任何地方比得上那里。”{n}乌尔法感怀地总结道。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And then comes the Season of Fire. Volcanoes awaken, waves wash over whole islands, and only the land of Asaheim offers salvation to those whose blood and grit win them the right to live upon it. Clan fights clan, crows circle over battlefields, and wolf howls rise up to the sky. That is my beloved home, there is no place in the universe like it," {n}Ulfar concludes wistfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “在那之后，就是火季。火山苏醒过来，巨浪冲刷着整个岛屿。只有阿萨海姆这片土地，才能为那些靠鲜血与勇气赢得生存权利的战士们提供救赎。氏族之间战火不断，乌鸦在战场上盘旋，狼嚎声响彻云霄。那就是我心爱的故乡，整个宇宙没有任何地方比得上那里。”{n}乌尔法感怀地总结道。{/n}

languages.text: «Luego llega la Estación de Fuego. Los volcanes despiertan, las olas barren islas enteras y solo Asaheim ofrece salvación a aquellos cuya sangre y cuyo valor les otorgan derecho a vivir en ella. Clanes luchan contra clanes bajo la mirada de los cuervos y un coro de aullidos se eleva hasta el cielo. Así es mi hogar, y no hay otro igual en el universo». {n}Ulfar termina, nostálgico.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And then comes the Season of Fire. Volcanoes awaken, waves wash over whole islands, and only the land of Asaheim offers salvation to those whose blood and grit win them the right to live upon it. Clan fights clan, crows circle over battlefields, and wolf howls rise up to the sky. That is my beloved home, there is no place in the universe like it," {n}Ulfar concludes wistfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Luego llega la Estación de Fuego. Los volcanes despiertan, las olas barren islas enteras y solo Asaheim ofrece salvación a aquellos cuya sangre y cuyo valor les otorgan derecho a vivir en ella. Clanes luchan contra clanes bajo la mirada de los cuervos y un coro de aullidos se eleva hasta el cielo. Así es mi hogar, y no hay otro igual en el universo». {n}Ulfar termina, nostálgico.{/n}

languages.text: 「そして炎の季節がやってくる。火山が目覚め、島全体が波に洗われ、アサへイムの地だけが、血と気合でこの地に生きる権利を勝ち得た者たちに救いを与える。一族が一族と戦い、カラスが戦場を旋回し、狼の遠吠えが空へと昇る。それが俺の愛する故郷だ。こんな場所はこの宇宙に他にはない」{n}ウルファーは物憂げに締めくくった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And then comes the Season of Fire. Volcanoes awaken, waves wash over whole islands, and only the land of Asaheim offers salvation to those whose blood and grit win them the right to live upon it. Clan fights clan, crows circle over battlefields, and wolf howls rise up to the sky. That is my beloved home, there is no place in the universe like it," {n}Ulfar concludes wistfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そして炎の季節がやってくる。火山が目覚め、島全体が波に洗われ、アサへイムの地だけが、血と気合でこの地に生きる権利を勝ち得た者たちに救いを与える。一族が一族と戦い、カラスが戦場を旋回し、狼の遠吠えが空へと昇る。それが俺の愛する故郷だ。こんな場所はこの宇宙に他にはない」{n}ウルファーは物憂げに締めくくった。{/n}

languages.text: "Und dann kommt die Zeit des Feuers. Vulkane erwachen, Wellen rauschen über ganze Inseln, und nur das Land Asaheim bietet Schutz — aber nur jenen, die durch Blut und Kampfgeist das Recht erringen, dort zu leben. Clans bekämpfen einander, Krähen kreisen über den Schlachtfeldern und Wolfsgeheul steigt gen Himmel auf. Das ist mein geliebtes Zuhause. Es gibt im ganzen Universum keinen anderen solchen Ort"{n}, schließt Ulfar wehmütig.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And then comes the Season of Fire. Volcanoes awaken, waves wash over whole islands, and only the land of Asaheim offers salvation to those whose blood and grit win them the right to live upon it. Clan fights clan, crows circle over battlefields, and wolf howls rise up to the sky. That is my beloved home, there is no place in the universe like it," {n}Ulfar concludes wistfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und dann kommt die Zeit des Feuers. Vulkane erwachen, Wellen rauschen über ganze Inseln, und nur das Land Asaheim bietet Schutz — aber nur jenen, die durch Blut und Kampfgeist das Recht erringen, dort zu leben. Clans bekämpfen einander, Krähen kreisen über den Schlachtfeldern und Wolfsgeheul steigt gen Himmel auf. Das ist mein geliebtes Zuhause. Es gibt im ganzen Universum keinen anderen solchen Ort"{n}, schließt Ulfar wehmütig.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est alors qu'arrive la saison du feu. Les volcans se réveillent, les vagues inondent des îles entières, et seul le territoire d'Asaheim offre le salut à ceux dont le sang et le courage les rendent dignes de le fouler de leurs pieds. Les clans s'affrontent, les corbeaux tournoient au-dessus des champs de bataille, et le loup hurle en direction du ciel. Voilà à quoi ressemble mon cher foyer, il n'existe aucun lieu similaire dans tout l'univers, » {n}conclut Ulfar avec nostalgie.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And then comes the Season of Fire. Volcanoes awaken, waves wash over whole islands, and only the land of Asaheim offers salvation to those whose blood and grit win them the right to live upon it. Clan fights clan, crows circle over battlefields, and wolf howls rise up to the sky. That is my beloved home, there is no place in the universe like it," {n}Ulfar concludes wistfully.{/n}

languages.original_text: "And then comes the Season of Fire. Volcanoes awaken, waves wash over whole islands, and only the land of Asaheim offers salvation to those whose blood and grit win them the right to live upon it. Clan fights clan, crows circle over the battlefields, and wolf howls rise up to the sky. That is my beloved home, there is no place in the universe like it," {n}Ulfar concludes wistfully.{/n}

languages.text: "Sonra Ateş Mevsimi gelir. Volkanlar kış uykusundan uyanır, dalgalar adaları yutar. Sadece Asaheim'de yaşamayı alnının teriyle kazananlar yuvasında huzur bulur. Klanlar birbiriyle savaşır, savaş meydanlarının üstünde kargalar gezinir, kurt ulumaları göklere yükselir. Benim canım yuvam, böyle bir yerdir. Evrende eşi benzeri yoktur." {n}Ulfar, sözünü efkarlı bir şekilde sonlandırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And then comes the Season of Fire. Volcanoes awaken, waves wash over whole islands, and only the land of Asaheim offers salvation to those whose blood and grit win them the right to live upon it. Clan fights clan, crows circle over battlefields, and wolf howls rise up to the sky. That is my beloved home, there is no place in the universe like it," {n}Ulfar concludes wistfully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sonra Ateş Mevsimi gelir. Volkanlar kış uykusundan uyanır, dalgalar adaları yutar. Sadece Asaheim'de yaşamayı alnının teriyle kazananlar yuvasında huzur bulur. Klanlar birbiriyle savaşır, savaş alanlarının üstünde kargalar gezinir ve kurt ulumaları göklere yükselir. Benim canım yuvam, böyle bir yerdir. Evrende ona benzer bir yer yoktur." {n}Ulfar, sözünü efkarlı bir şekilde sonlandırıyor.{/n}
